mapper.select: select count(*) from phar_information where mem_code=#{mem_code}
select medi_name, supply_value, chief_ingre from medi_information
select medi_code from medi_information where medi_name=#{medi_name}
select max(o_num) from order_info where mem_code = #{mem_code}

select o.o_date, o.o_num, o.sum_order_count, o.sum_supply_value, s.supplier_name, o.memo, ds.d_code from order_info o ,supplier_information s ,delivery_state ds where o.o_date >= (sysdate - 90) and o.o_num = ds.o_num and o.supplier_code = s.supplier_code and o.mem_code = #{mem_code} order by o.o_num desc

select d.o_num, mi.medi_name, d.order_quan, (d.order_quan * mi.supply_value) each_supply_value, mv.vari_code, d.medi_code from detail_order d ,medi_information mi ,medi_variation mv where d.medi_code = mi.medi_code and mi.medi_code = mv.medi_code and d.o_num = #{o_num}
select mi.medi_name, inv.rt_inven from inventory inv ,medi_information mi where inv.medi_code = mi.medi_code and inv.mem_code = #{mem_code}
